desc: Makers of the SCRIBE Bible Journal, the world's first HABIT-FORMING Bible study journal for busy Christians (backed by science). We create beautiful and innovative tools that are backed by science to help Christians grow closer to God. 100 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. Check out our store and place an order today!

layout.text: Get your quiet times done & grow closer to God.
Making time to read and meditate on Scripture everyday can be hard. Meet the world's first HABIT-FORMING Bible study journal (backed by neuroscience).
